EmailTemplate.description: 7 days after the Dispatch Date date and the Status of the Experience is not “Completed Experience”
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Notify that the parcel had been sent 7 days ago
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Order tracking Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Madam,
For your information, the botlles have arrived 7 days ago and the client {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name} hasn't received yet.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
